column4: hi there. the wubi instalation is good? does it make partitions?
it does not make real partitions
it puts Ubuntu inside  your Windows NTFS partition
then gives you the Windows boot loader and Grub the Linux boot loader.
as a result I would only recommend wubi for trying Ubuntu if at all
i want to use ubuntu in my laptop. that instalation is good or just for tying?
well  could do wubi, or  just try the live cd,  or  do  Ubuntu inside Windows to try
i dont want to try, i want to use it.
heh 3 guys wanting to do partition stuff all at once :d
are you on Ubuntu Live CD?
no. I have no partitions and i have winvista installed. its ok to make now partitions or its better to format first?
ok you want to dual boot
